2014年全国硕士研究生入学统一考试

英语（二）试题答案

英语二（海天版）参考答案

完型填空

5 D concern 6 A in terms of 7 C equals 8 C in turn

9 D straightforward 10 B while 11 A shape 12 B qualify

13 C normal 14 D tendency 15 B pictured 16 D associated

22 A critical

39 C contribute to funding new developments

40 D stop generous funding to the housing sector

翻译

大多数人将乐观定义为永远快乐，总觉得杯子里的水还有一半。但积极心理学家并不提倡这种虚假的快乐。“健康的乐观是与现实联系在一起的，”哈佛大学教授泰•本•萨哈说道。根据他的观点，现实的乐观主义者是去积极实现事情的圆满，而不是坐等事情自己圆满。

本•萨哈提出了乐观训练的三个阶段。当他心情低落时——比如，一个糟糕的演讲之后——他宽慰自己这是人之常情。他提醒自己不是每一次演讲都要求诺贝尔标准，有些演讲的效果就是不如其他。第二个阶段是重塑。他会分析这次失败的演讲，哪些地方可取，哪些不可取，为将来的演讲积累经验。第三个阶段是前瞻，我们要认识到在生命的宏伟蓝图中，一次演讲根本算不上什么。

新题型

41．D represents the elegance of the British land art

42．E depicts the ordinary side of the British land art

43．G contains images from different parts of the same photograph.

44．C reminds people of the English landscape painting tradition.

45．A originates from a long walk that the artist took

小作文

Dear John,
I am Li Ming, your prospective roommate, and so glad I am to share an apartment with you. I am writing this letter to tell you about my living habits as well as ask for your advice on my living there.

Outgoing as I am, I lead a regular life and prefer quiet living environment. Of course, the flexible schedule can be made for our comfortable life if necessary. What’s more, since it is the first time I go there I would like to ask for your advice concerning the life in your country, your local customs, climate and academic atmosphere to name but a few.

Thank you in advance. I am looking forward to your reply.

Sincerely Yours,

Li Ming

大作文

The above bar chart precisely reflects the change of urban and rural population in China over the past 20 years. As is depicted in the chart, from 1990 to 2010, the urban population increased drastically, changing from 300 million to 670 million, while the rural population witnessed a moderate decrease, changing from 830 million to some 680million. What the figure conveys is thought-provoking and far-reaching.

Though the causes for the phenomenon may be very complex, there are three main factors which can account for it. The primary one is that the 21st century has witnessed the unparallel economic prosperity and social progress in China. Another factor that we shouldn’t overlook is that people’s traditional values and ethics have changed drastically. Last but not least, the build of cities also contributes to this matter, which has lured increasing number of population from the countries pour into the city.

As discussed above, it is no surprise to see this situation. And I firmly believe that this established trend will continue and due importance should continue be placed on the factors that lead to the trend in the forthcoming years.

Part C

46. 这也可以解释为什么当我们试图用语言来描述音乐时，只能明确表达我们对于音乐的感受，而不能完全理解音乐本身。

47. 人们普遍认为，贝多芬是个思想自由的人，也是一个充满勇气的人，我发现勇气这一品质在理解他作品时是一个基本素质，更不必说在演奏其作品时。

48. 贝多芬习惯于逐渐增高音量至最大强度，然后突然以轻柔的乐段紧随其后，在他之前，作曲家很少使用这种方式。

49. 尤为重要的是贝多芬对于自由的看法，他认为，这种自由是与个人的权利和责任相联系的：他倡导思想自由和个人言论自由。

50. 我们可以这样解释贝多芬的大部分作品：苦难是不可避免的，但是与苦难抗争的勇气使得我们继续我们的生命。
Section III Writing

Part A

51.
Dear President,

I, the undersigned, am a senior student in our university, and I am writing this letter to express my views concerning how to improve students’ physical condition. In the first place, I would like to extend my heartfelt gratitude for the efforts you have taken to build our bodies. Meanwhile, I also would like to make some suggestions on further improvement.

First of all, health campaigns should be planned and organized to help students establish good habits such as health diet, enough sleep, abundant exercises, and so on. Secondly, students should be educated to be aware that health matters more than everything else. It is health that is the highest priority in life.

I am looking forward to your consideration about my proposals. Thanks in advance.

Yours Sincerely,

Li Ming

Part B

52.

As is realistically depicted in the cartoon given above, the left scene stands a striking contrast with the right one. In the former picture, the mother rears her little daughter carefully. Whereas in the latter one, the daughter supports her elderly mother. Just as the caption indicates that the mother and her child support each other. Simple as it is, the cartoons do convey a realistic and thought-provoking implication for both us and our society.

The primary purpose of this drawing can be simply interpreted in the following aspects. China has long been a civil country which places a high value on the traditional virtues, such as mutual-help, respecting the seniors and supporting parents and so on. It goes without saying that supporting parents is a virtue that we should place great importance on. Unfortunately, the real world is always not what we want it to be. There are still a number of people who fail to see the importance of it and abandon their responsibility of supporting parents. As a result, aging parents are left at home, feeling being neglected, which can exert negative influence on the health and happiness of the old. If we let it go, the problem will deteriorate our nation and the negative effects will expand without control.

Therefore measures should be taken to improve the situation. Government and the media should closely cooperate and each performs its own functions. First of all, government is supposed to establish some relative laws and regulations in order to consummate the current system of rewards and penalty. In addition, media such as television, radio and network should work together to educate the young that the true meaning of the life lies in the process rather than the outcome and that attending parents should be an everyday practice, rather than a goal waiting to be achieved.
